trans-unit.source: {default_op, Operation}, where Operation is either of the operations skip_tables, clear_tables, keep_tables, or recreate_tables. The default operation specifies which operation that is to be used on tables from the backup that is not specified in any of the mentioned lists. If omitted, operation clear_tables is used.
trans-unit.target: {default_op, Operation} ，其中 Operation 是 skip_tables ， clear_tables ， keep_tables 或 recreate_tables 之一。默认操作指定要在备份中的表上使用的未在任何提及的列表中指定的操作。如果省略，则使用 clear_tables 操作。

trans-unit.source: {default_op, Operation}, where Operation is one of the operations skip_tables, clear_tables, keep_tables, or recreate_tables. The default operation specifies which operation is to be used on tables from the backup that are not specified in any of the previous lists. If omitted, the operation clear_tables is used.
trans-unit.target: {default_op, Operation} ，其中 Operation 是操作 skip_tables ， clear_tables ， keep_tables 或 recreate_tables 之一。默认操作指定要在备份中的表上使用的操作，该操作在先前列表中未指定。如果省略，则使用 clear_tables 操作。

trans-unit.source: {disc_copies, NodeList}, where NodeList is a list of the nodes where this table is to reside on disc.
trans-unit.target: {disc_copies, NodeList} ，其中 NodeList 是此表将驻留在磁盘上的节点的列表。

trans-unit.source: {disc_copies, Nodelist}, where Nodelist is a list of the nodes where this table is supposed to have disc copies. If a table replica is of type disc_copies, all write operations on this particular replica of the table are written to disc and to the RAM copy of the table.
trans-unit.target: {disc_copies, Nodelist} ，其中 Nodelist 是该表应具有光盘副本的节点的列表。如果表副本的类型为 disc_copies ，则对该表的特定副本的所有写操作都将写入磁盘和表的RAM副本中。

trans-unit.source: {disc_only_copies, NodeList}. These table replicas are stored on disc only and are therefore slower to access. However, a disc-only replica consumes less memory than a table replica of the other two storage types.
trans-unit.target: {disc_only_copies, NodeList} 。这些表副本仅存储在磁盘上，因此访问速度较慢。但是，仅光盘副本消耗的内存少于其他两种存储类型的表副本。

trans-unit.source: {disc_only_copies, Nodelist}, where Nodelist is a list of the nodes where this table is supposed to have disc_only_copies. A disc only table replica is kept on disc only and unlike the other replica types, the contents of the replica do not reside in RAM. These replicas are considerably slower than replicas held in RAM.
trans-unit.target: {disc_only_copies, Nodelist} ，其中 Nodelist 是该表应具有 disc_only_copies 的节点的列表。仅光盘表副本仅保留在光盘上，并且与其他副本类型不同，副本内容不驻留在RAM中。这些副本比RAM中保存的副本要慢得多。

trans-unit.source: {done, Result, RestChars} when enough data is read. In this case Result is sent to the client and RestChars is kept in the I/O server as a buffer for later input.
trans-unit.target: {done, Result, RestChars} 读取足够的数据后，{完成，结果，RestChars}。在这种情况下， RestChars Result 发送到客户端，并将RestChars保留在I / O服务器中，作为以后输入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: {drop, N} if IP tracer is used (see dbg:trace_port/2)
trans-unit.target: {drop, N} 如果使用IP跟踪程序）（请参阅 dbg:trace_port/2 ）

trans-unit.source: {encoding, unicode | latin1} is supported by both the standard shell (group.erl including werl on Windows), the 'oldshell' (user.erl), and the file I/O servers.
trans-unit.target: {encoding, unicode | latin1} 标准外壳程序（在Windows上为 group.erl ,包括 werl ），“ oldshell”（ user.erl ）和文件I / O服务器均支持latin1}。

trans-unit.source: {encoding, utf8} has the same effect as {encoding, unicode} on files.
trans-unit.target: {encoding, utf8} {encoding, unicode} 对文件的作用与{encoding，unicode}相同。

trans-unit.source: {env, Vars}, representing the input environment of the subtree.
trans-unit.target: {env, Vars} ，表示子树的输入环境。

trans-unit.source: {eof,LOCATION}, denoting an end-of-stream encountered before a complete form had been parsed. The word LOCATION represents a location, and denotes the number of the last line, and possibly the number of the last column on that line, in the source file. See erl_anno(3) for details.
trans-unit.target: {eof,LOCATION} ，表示在解析完整表格之前遇到的流结束。单词 LOCATION 表示位置，并表示源文件中最后一行的编号，也可能表示该行最后一行的编号。有关详细信息，请参见 erl_anno(3) 。

trans-unit.source: {eof,LOCATION}, denoting an end-of-stream encountered before a complete form had been parsed. The word LOCATION represents an integer, and denotes the number of the last line in the source file.
trans-unit.target: {eof,LOCATION} ，表示在解析完整表格之前遇到的流结束。单词 LOCATION 表示一个整数，表示源文件中最后一行的编号。

trans-unit.source: {error, Reason} = transfer failed.
trans-unit.target: {error, Reason} =传输失败。

trans-unit.source: {error, Reason} if an error occurred when finding or evaluating the script
trans-unit.target: {error, Reason} 如果在查找或评估脚本时发生错误

trans-unit.source: {error, already_started, NodeName} if the node with the specified name is already started on a specified host.
trans-unit.target: {error, already_started, NodeName} 如果已在指定主机上启动了具有指定名称的节点，则为{错误，已经开始，节点名}。

trans-unit.source: {error, closed} if ListenSocket is closed
trans-unit.target: {error, closed} 如果 ListenSocket 关闭

trans-unit.source: {error, not_alive, NodeName} if the node on which ct_slave:start/3 is called, is not alive. Notice that NodeName is the name of the current node in this case.
trans-unit.target: {error, not_alive, NodeName} 如果调用了 ct_slave:start/3 的节点未激活，则为{error，not_alive，NodeName}。注意，在这种情况下， NodeName 是当前节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: {error, request} must be returned if the request is not recognized:
trans-unit.target: {error, request} 如果无法识别请求，则必须返回{error，request}：

trans-unit.source: {error, started_not_connected, NodeName} if the node is started, but not connected to the master node.
trans-unit.target: {error, started_not_connected, NodeName} 如果该节点已启动但未连接到主节点）。

trans-unit.source: {error, system_limit} if all available ports in the Erlang emulator are in use
trans-unit.target: {error, system_limit} 如果使用了Erlang仿真器中的所有可用端口，则为{error，system_limit}

trans-unit.source: {error, timeout} if no connection is established within the specified time
trans-unit.target: {error, timeout} 如果在指定时间内未建立连接

trans-unit.source: {error, {Error, ErrorDetails}} - if the callback module fails to proceed with the specified configuration parameters.
trans-unit.target: {error, {Error, ErrorDetails}} -如果回调模块无法继续使用指定的配置参数。

trans-unit.source: {error, {nofile, FileName}} - there is no file with the specified name in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: {error, {nofile, FileName}} -当前目录中没有具有指定名称的文件。

trans-unit.source: {error, {wrong_config, ConfigString}} - the configuration string is wrong.
trans-unit.target: {error, {wrong_config, ConfigString}} -配置字符串错误。

trans-unit.source: {error,BeamFile} is returned if the compiled code can not be loaded on the node.
trans-unit.target: {error,BeamFile} 如果无法将编译后的代码加载到节点上，则会返回{error，BeamFile}。

trans-unit.source: {error,BeamFile} is returned if the compiled code cannot be loaded on the node.
trans-unit.target: {error,BeamFile} 如果无法将编译后的代码加载到节点上，则会返回{error，BeamFile}。

trans-unit.source: {estimated_no_objects, no_slots()} - Equivalent to option min_no_slots.
trans-unit.target: {estimated_no_objects, no_slots() } -等效于 min_no_slots 选项。

trans-unit.source: {estimated_no_objects,no_slots()} - Equivalent to option min_no_slots.
trans-unit.target: {estimated_no_objects, no_slots() } -等效于 min_no_slots 选项。

trans-unit.source: {failover,Node} if the application is distributed and started at the current node because of a failover from Node, and the application specification key start_phases /= undefined.
trans-unit.target: {failover,Node} 如果应用程序被分发，并在因为从故障转移的当前节点开始 Node ，并且应用程序规范键 start_phases /= undefined 。

trans-unit.source: {false, NewState:any()} if the user or password is invalid
trans-unit.target: {false, NewState:any()} 如果用户名或密码无效，则为{false，NewState：any（）}

trans-unit.source: {file, file:name()} - The name of the file to be opened. Defaults to the table name.
trans-unit.target: {file, file:name() } -要打开的文件的名称。默认为表名。

trans-unit.source: {file_error, FileName, file:posix()} - For an explanation of file:posix(), see file(3).
trans-unit.target: {file_error, FileName, file:posix()} -有关 file:posix() 的说明，请参见 file(3) 。

trans-unit.source: {file_size, integer() >= 0}} - The file size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: {file_size, integer() >= 0}} -文件大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: {filename, file:name()} - The name of the file where objects are stored.
trans-unit.target: {filename, file:name() } -存储对象的文件名。

trans-unit.source: {format, Format} - Specifies the format of the objects returned by function InitFun. If Format is term (the default), InitFun is assumed to return a list of tuples. If Format is bchunk, InitFun is assumed to return Data as returned by bchunk/2. This option overrides option min_no_slots.
trans-unit.target: {format, Format} -指定函数 InitFun 返回的对象的格式。如果 Format 为 term （默认值），则假定 InitFun 返回元组列表。如果 Format 为 bchunk ，则假定 InitFun 返回 bchunk/2 返回的 Data 。此选项将覆盖选项 min_no_slots 。

trans-unit.source: {free, Vars}, representing the free variables in the subtree.
trans-unit.target: {free, Vars} ，表示子树中的自由变量。

trans-unit.source: {genErr, Column} where Column denotes the column that caused the error. Column must be one of the columns in the Cols list. Note that this should be an internal processing error, e.g. a caused by a programing fault somewhere. If some column does not exist, you must return the next accessible element (or endOfTable).
trans-unit.target: {genErr, Column} 其中 Column 表示引起错误的列。 Column 必须在一列的 Cols 列表。请注意，这应该是内部处理错误，例如，由于某个地方的编程错误引起的错误。如果某些列不存在，则必须返回下一个可访问元素（或 endOfTable ）。

trans-unit.source: {global,GlobalName}, if the gen_server process is globally registered
trans-unit.target: {global,GlobalName} ，如果 gen_server 进程已全局注册

trans-unit.source: {global,GlobalName}, if the event manager is globally registered
trans-unit.target: {global,GlobalName} ，如果事件管理器已全局注册

trans-unit.source: {global,Name}, if the supervisor is globally registered
trans-unit.target: {global,Name} ，如果主管是全局注册的

trans-unit.source: {hash, Hash} - Describes which BIF is used to calculate the hash values of the objects stored in the Dets table. Possible values of Hash:
trans-unit.target: {hash, Hash} -描述哪个BIF用于计算Dets表中存储的对象的哈希值。 Hash 值的可能值：

trans-unit.source: {index, AttributeNameList}, where AttributeNameList is a list of atoms specifying the names of the attributes Mnesia is to build and maintain. An index table exists for every element in the list. The first field of a Mnesia record is the key and thus need no extra index.
trans-unit.target: {index, AttributeNameList} ，其中 AttributeNameList 是原子列表，用于指定 Mnesia 将要构建和维护的属性的名称。列表中的每个元素都有一个索引表。 Mnesia 记录的第一个字段是关键，因此不需要额外的索引。

trans-unit.source: {index, Intlist}, where Intlist is a list of attribute names (atoms) or record fields for which Mnesia is to build and maintain an extra index table. The qlc query compiler may be able to optimize queries if there are indexes available.
trans-unit.target: {index, Intlist} ，其中 Intlist 是Mnesia要为其建立和维护额外索引表的属性名称（原子）或记录字段的列表。在 qlc 查询编译器可能如果有可用的索引可以优化查询。

trans-unit.source: {join, lookup} invokes the lookup join method.
trans-unit.target: {join, lookup} 调用查找联接方法。

trans-unit.source: {join, merge} invokes the merge join method.
trans-unit.target: {join, merge} 调用merge join方法。

trans-unit.source: {join, nested_loop} invokes the method of matching every pair of objects from two handles. This method is mostly very slow.
trans-unit.target: {join, nested_loop} 调用从两个句柄匹配每对对象的方法。此方法通常非常慢。

trans-unit.source: {keep_tables, TabList}, where TabList is a list of tables that is not to be cleared before the records from the backup are inserted. That is, the records in the backup are added to the records in the table. Schema information about the tables is not cleared or read from the backup.
trans-unit.target: {keep_tables, TabList} ，其中 TabList 是在插入来自备份的记录之前不清除的表的列表。即，备份中的记录将添加到表中的记录。有关表的架构信息不会清除或从备份中读取。

trans-unit.source: {keep_tables, TableList}, where TableList is a list of tables, which is not to be cleared before the records from the backup are inserted. That is, the records in the backup are added to the records in the table. Schema information about the tables is not cleared or read from the backup.
trans-unit.target: {keep_tables, TableList} ，其中 TableList 是表的列表，在插入来自备份的记录之前，不会清除这些表。即，备份中的记录将添加到表中的记录。有关表的架构信息不会清除或从备份中读取。

trans-unit.source: {keypos, keypos()} - The key position.
trans-unit.target: {keypos, keypos() } -关键位置。

trans-unit.source: {keypos, keypos()} - The position of the element of each object to be used as key. Defaults to 1. The ability to explicitly state the key position is most convenient when we want to store Erlang records in which the first position of the record is the name of the record type.
trans-unit.target: {keypos, keypos() } -每个用作键的对象的元素位置。默认值为1。当我们要存储Erlang记录（其中记录的第一个位置是记录类型的名称）时，显式声明键位置的功能最为方便。

trans-unit.source: {keypos,keypos()} - The key position.
trans-unit.target: {keypos, keypos() } -关键位置。

trans-unit.source: {keypos,keypos()} - The position of the element of each object to be used as key. Defaults to 1. The ability to explicitly state the key position is most convenient when we want to store Erlang records in which the first position of the record is the name of the record type.
trans-unit.target: {keypos, keypos() } -每个用作键的对象的元素位置。默认值为1。当我们要存储Erlang记录（其中记录的第一个位置是记录类型的名称）时，显式声明键位置的功能最为方便。

trans-unit.source: {load_order, Integer}. The load order priority is by default 0 (zero) but can be set to any integer. The tables with the highest load order priority are loaded first at startup.
trans-unit.target: {load_order, Integer} 。默认情况下，加载顺序优先级为 0 （零），但可以设置为任何整数。加载顺序优先级最高的表在启动时首先加载。

trans-unit.source: {local_content, Bool}, where Bool is true or false. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: {local_content, Bool} ，其中 Bool 为 true 或 false 。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: {local_content, true}. When an application needs a table whose contents is to be locally unique on each node, local_content tables can be used. The name of the table is known to all Mnesia nodes, but its contents is unique for each node. Access to this type of table must be done locally.
trans-unit.target: {local_content, true} 。当应用程序需要一个表，其内容在每个节点上在本地都是唯一的时，可以使用 local_content 表。该表的名称对于所有 Mnesia 节点都是已知的，但是其内容对于每个节点都是唯一的。对这种类型的表的访问必须在本地完成。

trans-unit.source: {lock, Lock}, where lock can be read or write. Default is read.
trans-unit.target: {lock, Lock} ，其中可以 read 或 write lock 。默认为 read 。

trans-unit.source: {majority, Flag}, where Flag must be a boolean. If true, any (non-dirty) update to the table is aborted, unless a majority of the table replicas are available for the commit. When used on a fragmented table, all fragments are given the same the same majority setting.
trans-unit.target: {majority, Flag} ，其中 Flag 必须为布尔值。如果为 true ，则对表的任何（非脏的）更新都将中止，除非大多数表副本可用于提交。在片段表上使用时，所有片段均具有相同的多数设置。

trans-unit.source: {max,MaxTabs}, where MaxTabs is a list of tables that are to be included in the checkpoint. Default is [] (empty list). For these tables, the redundancy is maximized. The old content of the table is retained in the checkpoint retainer when the main table is updated by the applications. The checkpoint is more fault tolerant if the tables have several replicas. When new replicas are added by the schema manipulation function mnesia:add_table_copy/3 it also attaches a local checkpoint retainer.
trans-unit.target: {max,MaxTabs} ，其中 MaxTabs 是要包含在检查点中的表的列表。默认值为 [] （空列表）。对于这些表，冗余被最大化。当应用程序更新主表时，表的旧内容将保留在检查点保留器中。如果表具有多个副本，则检查点具有更高的容错能力。当通过模式操作功能 mnesia:add_table_copy/3 添加新副本时，它还会附加一个本地检查点保持器。

trans-unit.source: {max,MaxTabs}. MaxTabs is a list of tables that are to be included in the checkpoint. Default is []. For these tables, the redundancy is maximized and checkpoint information is retained together with all replicas. The checkpoint becomes more fault tolerant if the tables have several replicas. When a new replica is added by the schema manipulation function mnesia:add_table_copy/3, a retainer is also attached automatically.
trans-unit.target: {max,MaxTabs} 。 MaxTabs 是要包含在检查点中的表的列表。默认值为 [] 。对于这些表，将最大限度地提高冗余度，并将检查点信息与所有副本一起保留。如果表具有多个副本，则检查点将具有更高的容错能力。通过模式操作功能 mnesia:add_table_copy/3 添加新副本时，还会自动附加一个保持器。

trans-unit.source: {max_no_slots, no_slots()} - The maximum number of slots to be used. Defaults to 32 M, which is the maximal value. Notice that a higher value can increase the table fragmentation, and a smaller value can decrease the fragmentation, at the expense of execution time.
trans-unit.target: {max_no_slots, no_slots() } -要使用的最大插槽数。默认值为32 M，这是最大值。注意，较高的值可以增加表的碎片，而较小的值可以减少表的碎片，但要花费执行时间。

trans-unit.source: {max_no_slots,no_slots()} - The maximum number of slots to be used. Defaults to 32 M, which is the maximal value. Notice that a higher value can increase the table fragmentation, and a smaller value can decrease the fragmentation, at the expense of execution time.
trans-unit.target: {max_no_slots, no_slots() } -要使用的最大插槽数。默认值为32 M，这是最大值。请注意，较高的值会增加表的碎片，而较小的值会减少表的碎片，但会浪费执行时间。

trans-unit.source: {memory, NoWords}, where NoWords is the number of words allocated to the ETS tables.
trans-unit.target: {memory, NoWords} ，其中 NoWords 是分配给ETS表的单词数。

trans-unit.source: {memory, integer() >= 0} - The file size, in bytes. The same value is associated with item file_size.
trans-unit.target: {memory, integer() >= 0} -文件大小，以字节为单位。相同的值与文件 file_size 关联。

trans-unit.source: {min,MinTabs}, where MinTabs is a list of tables that are to be included in the checkpoint. Default is []. For these tables, the redundancy is minimized, and there is to be single checkpoint retainer per table, preferably at the local node.
trans-unit.target: {min,MinTabs} ，其中 MinTabs 是要包含在检查点中的表的列表。默认值为 [] 。对于这些表，冗余被最小化，并且每个表最好有一个检查点保持器，最好在本地节点。

trans-unit.source: {min,MinTabs}. MinTabs is a list of tables that are to be included in the checkpoint. Default is []. For these tables, the redundancy is minimized and the checkpoint information is only retained with one replica, preferably on the local node.
trans-unit.target: {min,MinTabs} 。 MinTabs 是要包含在检查点中的表的列表。默认值为[]。对于这些表，冗余被最小化，并且检查点信息仅与一个副本一起保留，最好保留在本地节点上。

trans-unit.source: {min_no_slots, no_slots()} - Specifies the estimated number of different keys to be stored in the table. The open_file/2 option with the same name is ignored, unless the table is created, in which case performance can be enhanced by supplying an estimate when initializing the table.
trans-unit.target: {min_no_slots, no_slots()} -指定要存储在表中的不同键的估计数量。除非创建表，否则将忽略具有相同名称的 open_file/2 选项，在这种情况下，可以通过在初始化表时提供估计来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: {min_no_slots, no_slots()} - Application performance can be enhanced with this flag by specifying, when the table is created, the estimated number of different keys to be stored in the table. Defaults to 256, which is the minimum value.
trans-unit.target: {min_no_slots, no_slots() } -通过创建表时指定要存储在表中的不同键的估计数量，可以使用此标志来增强应用程序性能。默认值为256，这是最小值。

trans-unit.source: {min_no_slots,no_slots()} - Application performance can be enhanced with this flag by specifying, when the table is created, the estimated number of different keys to be stored in the table. Defaults to 256, which is the minimum value.
trans-unit.target: {min_no_slots, no_slots() } -通过在创建表时指定要存储在表中的不同键的估计数量，可以使用此标志来增强应用程序性能。默认值为256，这是最小值。

trans-unit.source: {mnesia_activity_event, Event} for activity events
trans-unit.target: {mnesia_activity_event, Event} 用于活动事件

trans-unit.source: {mnesia_dir, AlternateDir}. For semantics, see mnesia:install_fallback/2.
trans-unit.target: {mnesia_dir, AlternateDir} 。有关语义，请参见 mnesia:install_fallback/2 。

trans-unit.source: {mnesia_dir, AlternateDir}. This argument is only valid if the scope of the installation is local. Normally the installation of a fallback is targeted to the Mnesia directory, as configured with configuration parameter -mnesia dir. But by explicitly supplying an AlternateDir, the fallback is installed there regardless of the Mnesia directory configuration parameter setting. After installation of a fallback on an alternative Mnesia directory, that directory is fully prepared for use as an active Mnesia directory.
trans-unit.target: {mnesia_dir, AlternateDir} 。仅当安装范围是 local 此参数才有效。通常，后备安装的目标是Mnesia目录，如使用配置参数 -mnesia dir 配置的。但是通过显式提供 AlternateDir ，无论Mnesia目录配置参数设置如何，都将在其后备安装。在备用Mnesia目录上安装回退后，该目录已准备就绪，可以用作活动Mnesia目录。

trans-unit.source: {mnesia_system_event, Event} for system events
trans-unit.target: {mnesia_system_event, Event} 用于系统事件

trans-unit.source: {mnesia_table_event, Event} for table events
trans-unit.target: {mnesia_table_event, Event} 用于表事件

trans-unit.source: {module, BackupMod}. All accesses of the backup media are performed through a callback module named BackupMod. Argument Opaque is forwarded to the callback module, which can interpret it as it wishes. The default callback module is called mnesia_backup and it interprets argument Opaque as a local filename. The default for this module is also configurable through configuration parameter -mnesia mnesia_backup.
trans-unit.target: {module, BackupMod} 。备份媒体的所有访问均通过名为 BackupMod 的回调模块执行。参数 Opaque 被转发到回调模块，该模块可以根据需要对其进行解释。默认的回调模块称为 mnesia_backup ，它将参数 Opaque 解释为本地文件名。该模块的默认值也可以通过配置参数 -mnesia mnesia_backup 进行配置。

trans-unit.source: {module, BackupMod}. For semantics, see mnesia:install_fallback/2.
trans-unit.target: {module, BackupMod} 。有关语义，请参见 mnesia:install_fallback/2 。

trans-unit.source: {module,BackupMod}. The backup module BackupMod is used to access the backup media. If omitted, the default backup module is used.
trans-unit.target: {module,BackupMod} 。备份模块 BackupMod 用于访问备份媒体。如果省略，则使用默认备份模块。

trans-unit.source: {module,Mod}. The backup module Mod is used to access the backup media. If omitted, the default backup module is used.
trans-unit.target: {module,Mod} 。备份模块 Mod 用于访问备份媒体。如果省略，则使用默认备份模块。

trans-unit.source: {more, Continuation}, which indicates that more characters are needed to complete the request.
trans-unit.target: {more, Continuation} ，它指示需要更多字符才能完成请求。

trans-unit.source: {n_objects,Number}, where n_objects specifies (roughly) the number of objects returned from Mnesia to QLC. Queries to remote tables can need a larger chunk to reduce network overhead. By default, 100 objects at a time are returned.
trans-unit.target: {n_objects,Number} ，其中 n_objects 指定（大约）从Mnesia返回到QLC的对象数。对远程表的查询可能需要更大的块，以减少网络开销。默认情况下，一次返回 100 个对象。

trans-unit.source: {name,Name}, where Name specifies a temporary name of the checkpoint. The name can be reused when the checkpoint has been deactivated. If no name is specified, a name is generated automatically.
trans-unit.target: {name,Name} ，其中 Name 指定检查点的临时名称。停用检查点后，可以重用该名称。如果未指定名称，则会自动生成一个名称。

trans-unit.source: {name,Name}. Name is the checkpoint name. Each checkpoint must have a name that is unique to the associated nodes. The name can be reused only once the checkpoint has been deactivated. By default, a name that is probably unique is generated.
trans-unit.target: {name,Name} 。 Name 是检查点名称。每个检查点必须具有对于关联节点唯一的名称。仅在停用检查点后才能重用该名称。默认情况下，会生成一个唯一的名称。

trans-unit.source: {noValue, Error}. If the row does not exist, because all columns have {noValue, Error}), the single tuple {noValue, Error} can be returned. This is a shorthand for a list with all elements {noValue, Error}.
trans-unit.target: {noValue, Error} 。如果该行不存在，因为所有列都具有 {noValue, Error} ，则可以返回单个元组 {noValue, Error} 。这是包含所有元素 {noValue, Error} 的列表的简写。

trans-unit.source: {noValue, noSuchName}(SNMPv1)
trans-unit.target: {noValue, noSuchName} （SNMPv1）

trans-unit.source: {noValue, noSuchObject | noSuchInstance}(SNMPv2)
trans-unit.target: {noValue, noSuchObject | noSuchInstance} （SNMPv2）

trans-unit.source: {no_keys, integer >= 0()} - The number of different keys stored in the table.
trans-unit.target: {no_keys, integer >= 0()} -表中存储的不同键的数量。

trans-unit.source: {no_objects, integer >= 0()} - The number of objects stored in the table.
trans-unit.target: {no_objects, integer >= 0()} -表中存储的对象数。

trans-unit.source: {no_slots, {Min, Used, Max}} - The number of slots of the table. Min is the minimum number of slots, Used is the number of currently used slots, and Max is the maximum number of slots.
trans-unit.target: {no_slots, {Min, Used, Max}} -表的插槽数。 Min 是最小插槽数， Used 是当前使用的插槽数， Max 是最大插槽数。

trans-unit.source: {ok, Bin} = just another chunk of the file.
trans-unit.target: {ok, Bin} =文件的另一块。

trans-unit.source: {ok, Config} - if the configuration variables are read successfully.
trans-unit.target: {ok, Config} -如果成功读取配置变量。

trans-unit.source: {ok, Socket} if a connection is established
trans-unit.target: {ok, Socket} 如果已建立连接）

trans-unit.source: {ok, Unpurged} if evaluating the script is successful, where Unpurged is a list of unpurged modules
trans-unit.target: {ok, Unpurged} 如果评估脚本成功，则 Unpurged 是未清除模块的列表

trans-unit.source: {ok, {config, ConfigString}} - the parameter is a configuration string and it is correct.
trans-unit.target: {ok, {config, ConfigString}} -该参数是一个配置字符串，它是正确的。

trans-unit.source: {ok, {file, FileName}} - the parameter is a file name and the file exists.
trans-unit.target: {ok, {file, FileName}} -参数是文件名，并且该文件存在。

trans-unit.source: {outdir, NameOfDirectory} Create a file named TAGS in the directory NameOfDirectory.
trans-unit.target: {outdir, NameOfDirectory} 在 NameOfDirectory 目录中创建一个名为 TAGS 的文件。

trans-unit.source: {outfile, NameOfTAGSFile} Create a TAGS file named NameOfTAGSFile.
trans-unit.target: {outfile, NameOfTAGSFile} 创建一个名为 NameOfTAGSFile 的 TAGS 文件。

trans-unit.source: {overload, MSec, Module, Function} instructs the ttb back end (a part of the Runtime_Tools application) to perform overload check every MSec millisecond. If the check (named Module:Function(check)) returns true, tracing is disabled on the selected node.
trans-unit.target: {overload, MSec, Module, Function} 指示 ttb 后端（的一部分 Runtime_Tools 应用程序）来执行过载检查每 MSec 毫秒。如果检查（名为 Module:Function(check) ）返回 true ，那么将在所选节点上禁用跟踪。

trans-unit.source: {owner, pid()} - The pid of the process that handles requests to the Dets table.
trans-unit.target: {owner, pid()} -处理对Dets表的请求的进程的pid。

trans-unit.source: {premature_eof, FileName} - End-of-file was encountered inside some binary term.
trans-unit.target: {premature_eof, FileName} -在某个二进制术语内遇到了文件结尾。

trans-unit.source: {protection, Protection}, where Protection is protected or private, according to the options given to new.
trans-unit.target: {protection, Protection} ，根据对 new 的选择，其中 Protection 是 protected 还是 private 。

trans-unit.source: {ram_copies, NodeList}, where NodeList is a list of the nodes where this table is stored in RAM. Default is [node()]. If the default value is used to create a table, it is located on the local node only.
trans-unit.target: {ram_copies, NodeList} ，其中 NodeList 是此表存储在RAM中的节点的列表。默认值为 [node()] 。如果使用默认值创建表，则它仅位于本地节点上。

trans-unit.source: {ram_copies, Nodelist}, where Nodelist is a list of the nodes where this table is supposed to have RAM copies. A table replica of type ram_copies is not written to disc on a per transaction basis. ram_copies replicas can be dumped to disc with the function mnesia:dump_tables(Tabs). Default value for this attribute is [node()].
trans-unit.target: {ram_copies, Nodelist} ，其中 Nodelist 是该表应具有RAM副本的节点的列表。不会基于每个事务将 ram_copies 类型的表副本写入磁盘。可以使用 mnesia:dump_tables(Tabs) 函数将 ram_copies 副本复制到光盘中。此属性的默认值为 [node()] 。

trans-unit.source: {ram_file, boolean()} - Whether the table is kept in RAM.
trans-unit.target: {ram_file, boolean()} -表是否保留在RAM中。

trans-unit.source: {ram_file, boolean()} - Whether the table is to be kept in RAM. Keeping the table in RAM can sound like an anomaly, but can enhance the performance of applications that open a table, insert a set of objects, and then close the table. When the table is closed, its contents are written to the disk file. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: {ram_file, boolean()} -表是否要保留在RAM中。将表保留在RAM中听起来像是一种异常，但可以提高打开表，插入对象集然后关闭表的应用程序的性能。关闭该表后，其内容将写入磁盘文件。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: {ram_overrides_dump,Bool}. Only applicable for ram_copies. Bool allows you to choose to back up the table state as it is in RAM, or as it is on disc. true means that the latest committed records in RAM are to be included in the checkpoint. These are the records that the application accesses. false means that the records dumped to DAT files are to be included in the checkpoint. These records are loaded at startup. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: {ram_overrides_dump,Bool} 。仅适用于 ram_copies 。 Bool 允许您选择备份表状态（在RAM中还是在磁盘上）。 true 表示RAM中最新提交的记录将包含在检查点中。这些是应用程序访问的记录。 false 表示转储到 DAT 文件的记录将包含在检查点中。这些记录在启动时加载。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: {ram_overrides_dump,Bool}. This argument only applies to tables of type ram_copies. Bool specifies if the table state in RAM is to override the table state on disc. true means that the latest committed records in RAM are included in the checkpoint retainer. These are the records that the application accesses. false means that the records on the disc .DAT file are included in the checkpoint retainer. These records are loaded on startup. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: {ram_overrides_dump,Bool} 。此参数仅适用于 ram_copies 类型的表。 Bool 指定RAM中的表状态是否要覆盖磁盘上的表状态。 true 表示检查点保留程序中包含RAM中最新提交的记录。这些是应用程序访问的记录。 false 表示光盘 .DAT 文件上的记录包含在检查点保留器中。这些记录在启动时加载。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: {record_name, Atom} specifies the common name of all records stored in the table. All records stored in the table must have this name as their first element. record_name defaults to the name of the table. For more information, see Record Names versus Table Names.
trans-unit.target: {record_name, Atom} 指定表中存储的所有记录的通用名称。表中存储的所有记录都必须将此名称作为其第一个元素。 record_name 默认为表的名称。有关更多信息，请参见 Record Names versus Table Names 。

trans-unit.source: {record_name, Name}, where Name must be an atom. All records stored in the table must have this name as the first element. It defaults to the same name as the table name.
trans-unit.target: {record_name, Name} ，其中 Name 必须是一个原子。表中存储的所有记录必须将此名称作为第一个元素。它的默认名称与表名称相同。

trans-unit.source: {recreate_tables, TabList}, where TabList is a list of tables that is to be recreated before the records from the backup are inserted. The tables are first deleted and then created with the schema information from the backup. All the nodes in the backup need to be operational.
trans-unit.target: {recreate_tables, TabList} ，其中 TabList 是在插入来自备份的记录之前要重新创建的表的列表。首先删除表，然后使用备份中的架构信息创建表。备份中的所有节点都必须可操作。

trans-unit.source: {recreate_tables, TableList}, where TableList is a list of tables, which is to be recreated before the records from the backup are inserted. The tables are first deleted and then created with the schema information from the backup. All the nodes in the backup need to be operational.
trans-unit.target: {recreate_tables, TableList} ，其中 TableList 是表的列表，在插入备份的记录之前要重新创建这些表。首先删除表，然后使用备份中的架构信息创建表。备份中的所有节点都必须可操作。

trans-unit.source: {repair, Value} - Value can be either a boolean() or the atom force. The flag specifies if the Dets server is to invoke the automatic file reparation algorithm. Defaults to true. If false is specified, no attempt is made to repair the file, and {error, {needs_repair, FileName}} is returned if the table must be repaired.
trans-unit.target: {repair, Value} - Value 可以是 boolean() 或atom force 。该标志指定Dets服务器是否要调用自动文件修复算法。默认为 true 。如果指定了 false ，则不尝试修复该文件，如果必须修复该表，则返回 {error, {needs_repair, FileName}} 。

trans-unit.source: {safe_fixed, SafeFixed} - The same as {safe_fixed_monotonic_time, SafeFixed} except the format and value of FixedAtTime.
trans-unit.target: {safe_fixed, SafeFixed} -等同于 {safe_fixed_monotonic_time, SafeFixed} 除外的格式和值 FixedAtTime 。

trans-unit.source: {safe_fixed_monotonic_time, SafeFixed} - If the table is fixed, SafeFixed is a tuple {FixedAtTime, [{Pid,RefCount}]}. FixedAtTime is the time when the table was first fixed, and Pid is the pid of the process that fixes the table RefCount times. There can be any number of processes in the list. If the table is not fixed, SafeFixed is the atom false.
trans-unit.target: {safe_fixed_monotonic_time, SafeFixed} -如果表是固定的，则 SafeFixed 是一个元组 {FixedAtTime, [{Pid,RefCount}]} 。 FixedAtTime 是第一次修复表的时间，而 Pid 是修复表 RefCount 时间的进程的pid 。列表中可以有任意数量的进程。如果表不固定，则 SafeFixed 为原子 false 。

trans-unit.source: {save_config,Config} makes the Common Test test server pass Config to the next test case.
trans-unit.target: {save_config,Config} 使 Common Test 测试服务器将 Config 传递给下一个测试用例。

trans-unit.source: {schema, Tab, CreateList} specifies a table to be created. For more information about CreateList, see mnesia:create_table/2.
trans-unit.target: {schema, Tab, CreateList} 指定要创建的表。有关 CreateList 的更多信息，请参见 mnesia:create_table/2 。

trans-unit.source: {schema, Tab} specifies a table to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: {schema, Tab} 指定要删除的表。

trans-unit.source: {scope, Scope}. For semantics, see mnesia:install_fallback/2.
trans-unit.target: {scope, Scope} 。有关语义，请参见 mnesia:install_fallback/2 。

trans-unit.source: {scope, Scope}. The Scope of a fallback is either global for the entire database or local for one node. By default, the installation of a fallback is a global operation, which either is performed on all nodes with a disc-resident schema or none. Which nodes that are disc-resident is determined from the schema information in the backup.
trans-unit.target: {scope, Scope} 。回退的 Scope 对于整个数据库而言是 global ，对于一个节点而言是 local 的。默认情况下，后备安装是全局操作，该操作要么在所有具有磁盘驻留模式的节点上执行，要么不执行。根据备份中的架构信息确定哪些磁盘驻留节点。

trans-unit.source: {segment_timeout, missing_segments()} - one or more segments was not delivered before the expire of the segment timer.
trans-unit.target: {segment_timeout, missing_segments()} -在分段计时器到期之前未传送一个或多个分段。

trans-unit.source: {select, MatchSpec}. As for select, the table is traversed by calling mnesia:select/3 and mnesia:select/1. The difference is that the match specification is explicitly given. This is how to state match specifications that cannot easily be expressed within the syntax provided by QLC.
trans-unit.target: {select, MatchSpec} 。至于 select ，通过调用 mnesia:select/3 和 mnesia:select/1 遍历该表。区别在于明确指定了匹配规范。这是一种陈述匹配规范的方法，这些规范不能在QLC提供的语法中轻松表达。

trans-unit.source: {select, match_spec()} - As for select, the table is traversed by calling dets:select/3 and dets:select/1. The difference is that the match specification is specified explicitly. This is how to state match specifications that cannot easily be expressed within the syntax provided by qlc.
trans-unit.target: {select, match_spec() } -对于 select ，通过调用 dets:select/3 和 dets:select/1 遍历该表。区别在于匹配规范是明确指定的。这是说明状态规范的方法，这些规范不能轻易地在 qlc 提供的语法中表达。

trans-unit.source: {select,match_spec()} - As for select, the table is traversed by calling dets:select/3 and dets:select/1. The difference is that the match specification is specified explicitly. This is how to state match specifications that cannot easily be expressed within the syntax provided by qlc.
trans-unit.target: {select, match_spec() } -对于 select ，通过调用 dets:select/3 和 dets:select/1 遍历该表。区别在于匹配规范是明确指定的。这是一种陈述匹配规范的方法，该规范不能在 qlc 提供的语法内轻松表达。

trans-unit.source: {size, integer() >= 0} - The number of objects stored in the table.
trans-unit.target: {size, integer() >= 0} -表中存储的对象数。

trans-unit.source: {skip,Reason} indicates that the test case is skipped.
trans-unit.target: {skip,Reason} 表示已跳过测试用例。

trans-unit.source: {skip_tables, TabList}, where TabList is a list of tables that is not to be read from the backup.
trans-unit.target: {skip_tables, TabList} ，其中 TabList 是不从备份中读取的表的列表。

trans-unit.source: {skip_tables, TableList}, where TableList is a list of tables, which is not to be read from the backup.
trans-unit.target: {skip_tables, TableList} ，其中 TableList 是表列表，不能从备份中读取。

trans-unit.source: {snmp, SnmpStruct}. SnmpStruct is described in the SNMP User's Guide. Basically, if this attribute is present in ArgList of mnesia:create_table/2, the table is immediately accessible the SNMP.
trans-unit.target: {snmp, SnmpStruct} 。 SnmpStruct 在《 SNMP 用户指南》中进行了描述。基本上，如果此属性存在于 mnesia:create_table/2 的 ArgList 中，则可以通过SNMP立即访问该表。

trans-unit.source: {snmp, SnmpStruct}. For a description of SnmpStruct, see mnesia:snmp_open_table/2. If this attribute is present in ArgList to mnesia:create_table/2, the table is immediately accessible by SNMP. Therefore applications that use SNMP to manipulate and control the system can be designed easily, since Mnesia provides a direct mapping between the logical tables that make up an SNMP control application and the physical data that makes up a Mnesia table.
trans-unit.target: {snmp, SnmpStruct} 。有关 SnmpStruct 的描述，请参见 mnesia:snmp_open_table/2 。如果该属性出现在 ArgList 中以 mnesia:create_table/2 ，该表是立即SNMP访问。因此，由于Mnesia提供了组成SNMP控制应用程序的逻辑表和组成Mnesia表的物理数据之间的直接映射，因此可以轻松设计使用SNMP来操纵和控制系统的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: {ssh_cm,ssh:connection_ref(),channel_msg()}
trans-unit.target: {ssh_cm,ssh:connection_ref(),channel_msg()}

trans-unit.source: {storage_properties, [{Backend, Properties}] forwards more properties to the back end storage. Backend can currently be ets or dets. Properties is a list of options sent to the back end storage during table creation. Properties cannot contain properties already used by Mnesia, such as type or named_table.
trans-unit.target: {storage_properties, [{Backend, Properties}] 将更多属性转发到后端存储。 Backend 当前可以是 ets 或 dets 。 Properties 是在表创建期间发送到后端存储的选项的列表。 Properties 不能包含Mnesia已使用的属性，例如 type 或 named_table 。

trans-unit.source: {swapped,NewHandler,Pid}, if the process Pid has replaced the event handler with another event handler NewHandler using a call to swap_handler/3 or swap_sup_handler/3.
trans-unit.target: {swapped,NewHandler,Pid} ，如果进程 Pid 使用对 swap_handler/3 或 swap_sup_handler/3 的调用将事件处理程序替换为另一个事件处理程序 NewHandler 。

trans-unit.source: {swapped,NewHandler,Pid}, if the process Pid has replaced the event handler with another event handler NewHandler using a call to swap_handler/3 or swap_sup_handler/3.
trans-unit.target: {swapped,NewHandler,Pid} ，如果进程 Pid 使用对 swap_handler/3 或 swap_sup_handler/3 的调用将事件处理程序替换为另一个事件处理程序 NewHandler 。

trans-unit.source: {sysLocation, "upstairs"} or
trans-unit.target: {sysLocation, "upstairs"} 或

trans-unit.source: {tag(), tag_receiver()} - The information is delivered either via messages or via a function call according to the value of tag_receiver().
trans-unit.target: {tag(), tag_receiver()} -根据 tag_receiver() 的值，通过消息或通过函数调用传递信息。

trans-unit.source: {takeover,Node} if the application is distributed and started at the current node because of a takeover from Node, either because takeover/2 has been called or because the current node has higher priority than Node.
trans-unit.target: {takeover,Node} ,如果由于从 Node 进行接管而在当前节点上分发并启动了应用程序，则可能是因为已调用 takeover/2 或当前节点的优先级高于 Node 。

trans-unit.source: {tmpdir, TempDirectory} sets the directory used by merge join for temporary files and by option {cache, list}. The option also overrides option tmpdir of keysort/3 and sort/2. Defaults to "", which means that the directory returned by file:get_cwd() is used.
trans-unit.target: {tmpdir, TempDirectory} 设置用于临时文件的合并连接和用于选项 {cache, list} 。该选项还覆盖选项 tmpdir 的 keysort/3 和 sort/2 。默认为 "" ，这意味着使用 file:get_cwd() 返回的目录。

trans-unit.source: {tmpdir_usage, TmpFileUsage} determines the action taken when qlc is about to create temporary files on the directory set by option tmpdir. If the value is not_allowed, an error tuple is returned, otherwise temporary files are created as needed. Default is allowed, which means that no further action is taken. The values info_msg, warning_msg, and error_msg mean that the function with the corresponding name in module error_logger is called for printing some information (currently the stacktrace).
trans-unit.target: {tmpdir_usage, TmpFileUsage} 确定 qlc 将要在由选项 tmpdir 设置的目录上创建临时文件时采取的操作。如果该值不是 not_allowed ，则返回一个错误元组，否则将根据需要创建临时文件。默认是 allowed ，这意味着将不采取进一步的措施。值 info_msg ， warning_msg 和 error_msg 表示调用模块 error_logger 中具有相应名称的函数以打印一些信息（当前为stacktrace）。

trans-unit.source: {traverse, SelectMethod}, where traverse determines the method to traverse the whole table (if needed). The default method is select.
trans-unit.target: {traverse, SelectMethod} ，其中 traverse 确定遍历整个表的方法（如果需要）。默认方法是 select 。

trans-unit.source: {type, Type}, where Type must be either of the atoms set, ordered_set, or bag. Default is set. In a set, all records have unique keys. In a bag, several records can have the same key, but the record content is unique. If a non-unique record is stored, the old conflicting records are overwritten.
trans-unit.target: {type, Type} ，其中 Type 必须是原子 set ， ordered_set 或 bag 之一。默认 set 。在一个 set ，所有记录都有唯一的键。在 bag ，多个记录可以具有相同的键，但是记录的内容是唯一的。如果存储了非唯一记录，则旧的冲突记录将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: {user, integer()} - The manager will send response (acknowledgment) to inform-request messages when the handle_inform function completes. The integer is the time, in milli-seconds, that the manager will consider the stored inform-request info valid.
trans-unit.target: {user, integer()} -当 handle_inform 函数完成时，管理器将发送响应（确认）以通知请求消息。整数是管理器认为已存储的通知请求信息有效的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: {value, Value}. The Value must be of correct type, length and within ranges, otherwise genErr is returned in the response PDU. If the object is an enumerated integer, the symbolic enum value may be used (as an atom). If the object is of type BITS, the return value shall be an integer or a list of bits that are set.
trans-unit.target: {value, Value} 。该 Value 必须是正确的类型，长度并且在范围之内，否则在响应PDU中返回 genErr 。如果对象是枚举整数，则可以使用符号枚举值（作为原子）。如果对象是BITS类型，则返回值应为整数或已设置的位列表。

trans-unit.target: {value, Value} 。该 Value 必须是正确的类型，长度并且在范围之内，否则在响应PDU中返回 genErr 。如果对象是枚举的整数，则可以将符号枚举值用作原子。如果对象是BITS类型，则返回值应为整数或已设置的位列表。
